1.content:
The Expansion Virus is about to be released...

Developed at a top secret facility in the Navada Desert, the Expansion Virus, also known as the E-Formula, was designed to increase the size and strength of soldiers - effectively creating an army of super soldiers. However, things don't go quite according to plan, and soon, an untested version of the virus is released, causing anyone who is infected with it to undergo a serious growth spurt...

How the person grows varies, sometimes the virus can cause rapid weight gain, inflation or growth of a particular body part, and it can also manifest itself in different ways in men and women. The virus is unpredictable, and is mainly passed on through extended contact and exchange of bodily fluids.

---

Choose your setting.

A College Campus, where a group of students have managed to avoid infection, and make a break for freedom...

The City, where the virus has just spread, and begun infecting hundreds of people...

The Military Base, where the virus is being developed by a scientific team, and is just about to be released upon the world...

A High School, where the virus has just spread to the student population...

11.content:
Characters:

Dee: A gorgeous, 21 year old blonde, Dee was studying Biology before the virus broke out, and, as such, is quite interested in the virus from a scientific point of view. She is sweet, outgoing and friendly, and always trying to help people, but is also quite naive.

Kate: A beautiful, 20 year old brunette. Kate has quite a bitchy and selfish personality, and is quite disdainful of the rest of the group.

Liz: A 21 year old goth girl with red hair. She is the outsider of the group, but one of the most intelligent. She tends to keep to herself.

Alison: The object of desire for most of the men on campus, Alison is a ditzy 18 year old who was failing most of her classes before the virus came along. Alison is oblivious to the attention she receives from men.

Erica: A chubby 19 year old who envies the other girls bodies and good looks. She is the smartest of the group, and often assumes the leader position.

Josh: An athletic 18 year old, and formerly the head of a swim team at the college. He is confident and kind, and has a huge crush on Dee.

Kyle: 19 year old Kyle is intelligent, but works part time as a model in order to get by. His good looks attract many of the girls on campus, but he is often too shy to ask them out.

Luke: Luke is scrawny, and very geeky. He is one of the smartest members of the group, but is very shy, and ends up not saying much, and often being the subject of Kate's put downs.

---

At a College Campus, just a few miles outside the city, a small group of students had managed to escape the effects of the virus. The group consisted of nine young adults, each aged between 18 and 21. They had realised what was happening soon after the outbreak of the virus, and had all managed to avoid it's effects by being as cautious as possible...

The nine students, who had joined forces in order to avoid infection by the virus were currently huddled around the TV. The group consisted of Erica, Dee, Kate, Alison, Liz, Kyle, Josh and Luke - all of them students who had barely known each other up until a week ago.

The reporter on the news was a tall, attractive woman, who had clearly begun to feel the effects of the virus. Her breasts were incredibly large, and were threatening to burst out of her top. She struggled with her clothing as she continued her report. "As of yet, there is still no explanation for the rapid expansions that are affecting millions of people across the world. The government is still advising people to stay in their homes and wait this out, but who knows how long this will last..."

"So, I guess we're stuck here until they find a cure, huh?" Kyle said.

"Looks like it," Liz replied casually, not taking her eyes off the TV.

"No way am I staying here any longer!" Kate pouted, folding her arms and glaring at the others. "There's barely room for three people here, let alone nine!"

"I think it's safer here, for now..." Luke said.

"Oh what do you know? Nerd." Kate replied sarcastically.

"Oh, leave him alone Kate," Erica snapped. "I don't hear you coming up with any bright ideas."

"Guys, I think we might need to make a break for it," Erica said, addressing the group. "We're running low on food, and I don't think help is coming any time soon. If we're going to get out of here, I think it needs to be soon."

"I agree with Erica," Dee said. "It doesn't look like they've developed any sort of cure for the virus yet, and we know this place is full of infected students, who are just going to keep getting bigger."

"Dee's right, I think we should go," Josh said quickly.

"What does everyone else think?" Erica asked.

"Fine by me," Alison replied, chewing on some gum. "I was getting bored here anyway."

"Whatever," Liz replied in a bored voice.

"I'm up for it," Kyle said.

"I...I guess I'm up for it too," Luke said.

Kate was the last to agree. "Fine, let's go."

With everyone agreed, Kyle unlocked the door and pushed it open, looking into the corridor to make sure the way was clear.

"The coast's clear," Kyle said, beckoning the others. "Let's get out of here."

"So, where do we go now?" Kyle asked.

"The hell out of here!" Kate snapped.

"Hold on, their might be some more people around here who haven't been infected!" Dee protested.

"Dee's right," Erica said. "We should have a look around first, see if we can help anyone else."

"I thought the idea was to leave, not hang around even longer!" Kate hissed.

"She's got a point," Kyle shrugged.

"Look, you can all go your own way if you like, but we're not going to get very far on our own. So let's just do a quick search of the area then we'll head off, okay?"

Which character do you wish to follow?

111.content:
Dee was all for looking for any other uninfected people on the campus. For all they knew, there was another group of students hauled up in a dorm room somewhere just like they had been. The virus had scared everyone senseless, but not Dee, she had been fascinated by it. She had always had an interest in biology and chemistry, and the way this mysterious virus had come out of nowhere and begun to affect people's bodies was something she found very intriguing. She wished she could have studied it...but was glad she had stayed away - while her classmates had bloated and grown over the past few weeks, Dee had been extra cautious

"I guess I'll go and search the labs," Dee announced. "That's the area I know best."

"Good idea," Erica said. "Let's split up and meet back here in half an hour, if we don't find anything, we'll make a move and get the hell outta here."

The others nodded, and went their separate ways. Dee walked down the stairs, and followed the corridor along to the science department. The hallways were empty, and Dee had never seen the campus looking quite so ominous...without the bustling activity that usually filled the halls, it seemed cold and eerie.

"Hello?" Dee called out as she pushed open the doors to the labs. "Is anybody here?"
111.title: Dee

1111.content:
"Urghhhhhhhhhhh..."

Dee jumped, startled by a loud groaning noise that had emanated from somewhere in the room. Whoever had made the noise had sounded in pain, and was possible a victim of the virus...but then again, perhaps they were just injured? Dee looked back at the door, and for a moment, she considered turning tail and running from the room, but her curiosity prevailed.

"Urghhhh..."

Dee slowly made her way towards the place the noise was coming from, shooting careful glances over her shoulder and down the aisles of desks to make sure nobody could take her by surprise.

"Urghhh...is somebody there?"

Dee froze, and realised she was only a few feet away from the person. "Yes," she said, her voice trembling. "Are you okay?"

"I...I know that voice...is that...Dee?" The voice asked.

Dee now realised that whoever was speaking to her was slumped down behind one of the desks. She had no idea who this person was, but apparently they knew her. She moved a little closer, and furtively peered around the side of the desk, what she saw made her gasp in shock.

Slumped against the desk was an enormous girl, about three times the size of Dee. Her body was covered in rolls of flab, her stomach was a bulging monstrosity the size of a dozen beach balls and her huge sagging breasts rested atop it while a sad and pitiful face stared up at the slim girl looking down on it. The girl raised a flabby arm and rubbed at her tired looking eyes.

"It is you!" The girl said, with a note of happiness in her deep voice.

Dee could only stare at what was probably the fattest human being she had ever seen in her life. She backed away a little, not wanting to get too close - the girl was definitely infected, and it looked like the virus was in an advanced stage.

"You don't recognise me, do you?" The girl asked, sadly.

Dee shook her head, feeling guilty. "No, sorry."

"It's me Dee, it's Claire."

Dee's mouth dropped open as she realised who she was talking to. This girl, Claire, had been her lab partner just a few weeks ago, and when she and Dee had last seen one another, Claire hadn't weighed any more than 180 pounds. Dee was horrified by what her friend had become.

"Oh my God...Claire...when did you get infected?"

"I was one of the first," Claire said, sighing sadly. "I tried to hide it at first but..."

Dee tried to smile. "It's okay. What are you doing down here?"

"I thought maybe I could try and reverse it, fat chance huh?" Claire snorted, apparently oblivious to the pun she had just made. "If those government scientists couldn't find a cure, what hope did I have?"

"And you've been down here ever since?" Dee asked.

"Over the last few days I've gotten too big to keep moving around, so I've just stocked up on food and hidden myself away. I didn't want anyone to see me like this..." Claire looked down at her chubby body, and tried to cover her exposed breasts with her thick arms. "Do you think...maybe you can help me?"

Dee wasn't sure what to say...part of her desperately wanted to help her friend return to normal, and to study the virus in the hope of finding a cure. On the other hand, it was possible that if she hung around here any longer, she might get infected herself, and now that she had witnessed the full effects of the virus, she knew she never wanted to experience such a horrific fate.

He looked over his clipboard. “I’m Dr. Lewis. When you didn’t report in I had to track you by the use of your keycard. Did you lose track of the time?” Dee nodded. “Come with me please,”

With that he spun on his heel and headed out. Dee followed, figuring it would look too suspicious if she did not follow him.

Dr. Lewis led her into a laboratory/operating room. There was a brunette nurse present, or at least someone in a nurse’s uniform. She was a little over 5’ tall and smiled reassuringly, everything about her designed to appear comforting and non-threatening.

The very fact that she was clearly intended to put Dee at ease raised alarm bells. However, Dee didn’t see any alternative but to obey as they ushered her onto an operating table and placed various trays of instruments and electronic devices around her.

Deciding she had nothing to lose from speaking up, Dee asked the obvious question. “What are you doing with me?”

Dr. Lewis frowned in a distracted manner as he examined a read-out. “This was all explained previously, or so I was assured. However, if it will help take your mind off of any nervousness Nurse Foster will explain.”

With that the Doctor leaned over and focused on her belly, where she could feel the slime lying quietly. Dee looked at the nurse, who began to speak in tones as calming as her demeanor.

In exchange you ingested slime, and fortunately retained your physical body. We’re examining you to determine exactly why, and duplicate the process so we can immunize others.”

Dr. Lewis spoke up at that point in tones indicating he didn’t like being upstaged. “If we can isolate the immunity factor that you Slimers possess and create a vaccine, then we can use the slime to eliminate any stubborn pockets of resistance, even winnow the population if needed, with no fear that those chosen to lead will fall sway.”

Dee shook her head. “If we delay, chances are these leaders of yours will figure out what’s happened, and they can gather forces more quickly than I can. We attack now, when we’ve got the element of surprise on our side.”

Nurse Foster nodded, and the trio set up their plan. Dee put on a pair of pants and hospital slippers, with no shirt. Dr. Lewis assured her that such sights were common when subjects outgrew their tops, and her pendulous breasts certainly made that plausible. It also freed her two greatest weapons.

For a time it seemed that Dee wouldn’t need them, as Dr. Lewis got them past several checkpoints and into the heart of the facility. His clearance seemed unstoppable.

They finally passed through a corridor with no other traffic, then turned a corner and saw a door guarded by a man with an automatic weapon and wary eyes. Dr. Lewis strode forward, Nurse Foster and Dee in his wake. Dee did her best to appear cowed.

This time Dr. Lewis’ ID didn’t work. “No clearance without express authorization from the Chair’s direct representative. Which you don’t have.” The soldier shifted his weapon in a subtle, yet clear, threat.

Dee decided it was time to strike. Without any warning she fired a torrent of slime at the guard through her breasts, drenching him so powerfully that it slipped in through his pores and went to work immediately. With his quick reactions he almost got his weapon clear and aimed at the trio, but almost wasn’t good enough. His hands dissolved and the weapon clattered to the floor. He opened his mouth to shout a warning, but his vocal cords were gone, and in seconds all that remained were a pile of clothes and a stain on the floor.

Dee picked up the guard’s access card, clipped to his belt, and confidently swiped it into the reader by the door. The status light turned green and Dee opened the door, striding inside. Dr. Lewis and Nurse Foster, aware that their lives were dependent upon Dee, quickly followed her. Once inside they took up flanking positions.

The room was fairly dark, with a number of large monitors and banks of computers providing data and video surveillance of numerous areas. There was a virtual mirror image of Dee’s intrusion, with a single female flanked by a male and a female. The trio in the room turned toward the door, the two on the ends stepping forward into a protective formation similar to what Dee’s slaves had done.

Dee hardly noticed them, as her eyes were locked on their leader, a trim brunette who was very familiar to Dee.

It was Kate.

Kate looked at Dee with an amused expression. “Surprised?” she said. “I’m glad to see that I was that good of an actress.”

“But why?” Dee said.

“The college was a key vector for the virus,” Kate explained, “so I wanted to be on-site. My bitchy front caused the rest of you to not care if I slipped away, and to underestimate me.”

“Kate, you have to stop this,” Dee implored, “this is evil!”

“You’re naïve,” Kate retorted. “This is the only way humanity can survive. Look at the world-torn by war, famine, poverty, pollution, greed and chaos. How long can humanity continue on this path? Our species will destroy itself, exhaust our resources, and no one could stop it until now.”

“But you’re destroying freedom,” Dee argued, “you can’t take away free will. Without that, what’s the point of living?”

Kate stepped forward. Her bodyguards tensed, but didn’t stop her. “Dee, we’re trying to save humanity. Sure, some freedoms may be temporarily curtailed, but ultimately humanity will be transformed and improved. It’s better that we, as a species, live than that some are given the freedom to destroy us all.”

Kate pressed on, her eyes open and hands reaching out. “Join us Dee. You’ve proven yourself to be brave, intelligent and resourceful. See what we’re doing, provide your input, and make us better.”

Dee considered Kate’s words, and the potential power she offered. Power Dee might use to help her world survive. But wouldn’t she be corrupted by that power as well: power no one should have? On the other hand, she could join and, if she decided she couldn’t work from within, attack later.

Of course, it could also be a ploy to get her to drop her guard. If she attacked now she could defeat Kate and put a dent in Shadowtech’s plans.

Dee decided to go and find Claire some help. She couldn't just abandon her here; at the rate Claire was growing, she would end up starving to death in this environment. "Wait here," Dee said, though she quickly realized that her overweight friend had little choice. "I'll find you some help and get you out of here."

"Oh, thankyou, thankyou..." Claire said, her multiple chins shaking as she spoke.

Dee exited the lab and hurried back out into the corridor. If she could catch up with the others, she might be able to convince some of the guys to help her get Claire to a safer location. The risk of infection seemed low enough, since Claire was not exhibiting some of the more extreme side effects of expansion such as lactation and an increased sex drive.

Heading back the way she came, Dee was startled by a loud groaning noise. She froze in her tracks, thinking for a moment that it might be Claire...but this sounded too close. This noise had come from another room. The groaning noise continued, getting louder and louder as Dee continued on. Another classroom at the end of the corridor was obviously where the noises were coming from, given how loud the moaning had become. It sounded like someone was in pain, so Dee carefully pushed open the door and looked inside.

"Hello?" She almost whispered.

"Help us...please..."

"Help us!"

"Hellllp..."

"What's wrong?" Dee asked as she stepped inside the room. "Are you infected?"

No sooner had she stepped inside than four large women were moving towards her. It was dark in the classroom, and the furniture had all been tipped over or pushed to the far side of the room, so Dee could make out their silhouettes as they stumbled onwards. Dee backed away as the lumbering women advanced on her. As they grew closer, Dee realized they had succumbed to the same strand of the virus that had consumed Claire, and while they were not quite as large as her friend, they were easily over three hundred pounds each, their huge, flabby bodies and beach ball sized bellies jiggling as they approached.

"Wait, stay back..." Dee said, but they didn't stop.

"Help...us...."

"Do something...."

Their cries were desperate, and they didn't seem to be listening to a word Dee was saying. Panicking, Dee made for the door behind her, only to feel a fat hand grab hold of her arm. Dee tried to free herself, but the girl's grip was too strong. Instead, she found herself face to face with a drooling, puffy cheeked young woman, whose moaning was slowly turning into a ravenous growl.

"Let me go!" Dee cried. "I'm trying to help you!"

But the girl would not listen, and soon her three companions had caught up, and were tugging at Dee's other arm. Dee struggled desperately, but they had her pinned in place. She couldn't even reach for the door handle now, and soon the obese naked bodies of the four women were pushing up against her, squashing her against the wall. She was trapped.

The shape of the virus' constituent molecules is consistent only with simultaneous exposure to high hydrostatic pressure and radiation intensity as high as (or higher than that) experienced at the surface of a planet in order to drive the necessary reaction." 115321.content:
"Help! Somebody help me!"

The tranquility if the moment was suddenly shattered as a panicked yell pierced the air. Luke, already on edge, jumped at the noise and instinctively dived into the cover of an open broom cupboard. It wasn't the bravest of positions, but Luke had quickly learnt that cowardice leads to a better chance of survival in the crisis. From Luke's scrunched position in the tiny off shoot, he peeped one eye out to get a view on where the noise might be coming from.

The screams had come from down the hall, around the corner and out of sight. The echoes that bounced of the desolate walls made it difficult to tell how far away the noise originated, which didn't help to calm Luke's nerves. Luke twisted his head to try and get a good listen of any follow up noises, but all he could hear where the sounds of wind and the occasional knocking from somewhere else in the building. Luke began to wonder if he had imagined the noise, but quickly dismissed it. He was scared, not insane. Instead, he began to weigh up the facts in his head.

At the most, the scream likely came from an infected student panicking at there growth. But at best, this could by a perfectly normal student who was injured or trapped. Someone rational and in need of assistance. Maybe someone Luke knew.

At worst of course, this was a student being hunted by the more crazed infected in the campus, looking for prey. Luke decided not to think about that one.

Luke ran all three scenarios in his head. In two of the three, he was safe, either helping a student or avoiding a new infected. Of course, the last scenario ended badly for him, but surely even so, he had the moral responsibility to see if this really was just a normal student. How would he like it if he was in a similar scenario.

Slowly creeping from his hiding place, Luke half walked, half crouched his way down the halls of the campus and through the twisting corridors, eventually reaching the last corner before the source of the first scream.

This close, sounds became more clear. He could hear footsteps, pacing not to far away, interrupted every so often by the sound of banging on wood. Luke took a breath and relaxed. A trapped student surely, locked accidentally in one of the old dorm rooms. Best case scenario, he thought to himself and he turned the corner to peak. Best case scenario. Best case scenario.

Worst case scenario.

The sight Luke saw sent chills down his spine. Down the hall, not 10 steps away, stood a giant of a man, looming over a locked storage cupboard.

Not only was he giant, at least 8 feet, the man was ripped beyond belief. Every part of him was packed with muscle, and his glistening sweat shone brightly off his 6 pack. His arms where bulbous, thick and sturdy, matching his toned legs perfectly. Despite the free gun show he displayed, he had enough modesty to repurpose some old fabric into a primitive, front facing loincloth, covering his crotch. Of course, it made little difference really, as Luke could still see the outer edges of his balls resting against the fabric quite clearly. He must have been as big as a soccer ball. The dark haired Goliath brushed one hand through his messy locks before turning to address the cupboard.

"Come in man, we're having a lot of fun in the courtyard, and we need people like you to keep the games going. Who knows, you might win."

There was a light pause before a wimped returned from the cupboard.

"G-go away you fucking freak, I'm not coming out"

The Goliath paused for a moment before putting one hand on top of the cupboard door. For how rude his prisoner was being, he didn't seem phased in the slightest.

"Look buddy, the rules are we've all got to bring someone back. I don't want to look like an asshole in front of my friends, you understand? So we can do this the easy way, or the still pretty easy way.

"Fuck you" a call came back from inside the cupboard.

"Suit yourself"

In one slick motion, the Goliath placed his fingers in-between the door and frame, and tore the whole thing off with a flick of his wrist.

Luke could only watch in horror as the man in the cupboard, a lanky nerd, was pulled kicking and screaming away from his cover and thrown onto the shoulder of the bigger man. He quickly lost his strength however and resided himself to his fate, going limp as the Goliath turned towered a nearby staircase that led to the courtyard, singing a merry tune.

Luke planted himself against the wall he had been hiding behind, utterly in shock at what he had witnessed. His mind raced with possible scenarios for what awaited the man in the cupboard. Games? What the hell did that mean? Nothing good by the giant's face, and nothing he wanted to stick around to see. Luke scurried to his feet, but not before catching a glimpse of the Giant in a nearby window, stroking across the empty park area. A niggle started to eat it's way into Luke's mind. Could he really leave? That man was in trouble, and one of the few non infected still left on Campus. Surely if Luke was in his position, he'd want help himself. Luke took one last look at the hallway. Run or help?

"…As of yet, there is still no explanation for the rapid expansions that are affecting millions of people across the world. The government is still advising people to stay in their homes and wait this out, but who knows how long this will last..."

The small T.V in the corner of the cooking room continued to drain on about the virus, but by this point, the small group of survivors all huddled together eating the last of the provisions took no notice. There were far more pressing matters on their mind right now, as with the last of the last of the foods gone, their hope of staying hidden until rescue dwindled to impossible.

“That’s the last of the food” Mark said, admitting what no one wanted to hear.

“What are we going to do now then?” asked Laura, picking through the crumbs of an old biscuit packet. “This was the best place on campus for supplies”

The group was silent for a few seconds before Diana, the self-appointed leader, jumped to her feet.

“Well these only one thing we can do. We have to try and escape”

The others looked at her with surprise. With so many infected students around the collage, escape seemed even an even worse idea then staying here.

“That’s an idiotic idea” replied Julie, having joined Diana on her feet with her arms crossed over her chest. “Where exactly are we supposed to go? The city is blocked of the halls are filled with the fools that got themselves infected.

“Hey, it’s not all their fault they got infected!” piped up Laura, not willing to have her friends old mocked by Julie. “Some of them were just unlucky”
“They were morons for not taking appropriate precautions, and what else-”

The argument was stopped by Mark coming between them, knowing that falling out in a survival situation was a foolish mistake to make.
“Now now, everybody just calm down. We are all a bit tense from being cooped up in here”

Mark was quickly becoming the only voice of reason in the small cooking room, but it wasn’t long before everyone had calmed down a bit.
“Now, I know you think trying to escape is a bad idea Julie, but right now we don’t really have a choice. Food is gone and no one is coming, so we need to think of escape options”

“There would have to be some cars left in the parking lot, so we should have transport” replied Diana.

“So all we need to do is find some car keys and get to a vehicle, sound good?”

The others nodded in agreement. As much as it was risky, it was the only option for the group now.

“Wait a minute!” cried Hailey, who hadn’t seemed to be paying attention until now. “What about other survivors!”

The other looked at her for a moment in thought.

“We can’t risk looking for others” Said Julie, still cross. “It would be far too risky”

“I’m with her!” Cried Hannah. “There’s no way I’m going to get infected”

“Well, I think Hailey is right, we should try to help other if we find them” replied Diana, standing next to Hailey to face the others. “What do you guys think?”

“Look, we don’t have time for that right now” again spoke Mark, standing between to two sides. “If we find anyone else on the way, that’s good, but right now, transport is our top priority.” For once, Diana and Julie agreed on the decision. It would be their choice to save or leave anyone they find.

Slowly, Ryan removed the wooden boards attached to the door and stepped out, checking to see if anyone was around. When the coast was clear, the group of 8 stepped out into the hallway to try and find a way off campus.

Who do you follow?

It didn't take long for Kevin to notice her; he quickly shot Amy a wave and hurried over to her exercise bike. Ignoring the two larger women either side of the gorgeous model, Kevin leant on the handlebars of Amy's bike as she peddled.

"Didn't you have that photoshoot today? Didn't expect to see you in so early!" Kevin smiled.

"Meh, it was over pretty quick," Amy said, continuing to peddle. "Same old, same old."

Amy let her eyes wander over Kevin's body, and she couldn't help but notice that he looked different. Bigger, even. As she concentrated on her trainer's physique, she could see that his muscles had grown - his arms definitely looked thicker, and he looked bulkier all over. She had only seen him a few days ago, had he really buffed up that fast? One way to find out, Amy thought.

"So...have you been working out a lot lately? You look a little...bigger," Amy said, trying to sound as innocent as possible.

Kevin shrugged, and folded his muscled arms. "Yeah, I think I might be overdoing it lately...I didn't even realise I was getting this big. I never thought I'd say this, but I might actually have to cut down on exercise for a while!"

Amy laughed. "That's so weird, but you're in such good shape that you could go without exercise for about a month."

Kevin grinned. "Say...are you...busy later?"

Amy raised an eyebrow curiously, but didn't stop peddling. "Nope," she said quickly. "Why?"

"I was wondering if you wanted to maybe get a drink or something later?" Kevin asked, shifting from one foot to the other in a nervous manner. He looked hopefully at the model in front of him.

Amy stopped peddling. "I'd love to," she said.

"Great! Shall we say about 8? I get off in half an hour anyway," Kevin suggested, his eyes lighting up.

"Sounds good," Amy smiled broadly. She had hoped that Kevin would ask her out for a while now, but he always seemed too shy to ask. Amy had never forced the issue, she didn't really pry into Kevin's personal life, and wasn't sure whether he had a girlfriend or not.

As Kevin headed off to speak to someone else, Amy quickly hopped off the bike and hurried back the locker rooms, wanting enough time to make herself look good for the date. She had only been working out for about fifteen minutes, but had already worked up quite a sweat.

---

After taking a shower, putting on her make up and doing her hair all within half an hour, Amy hurried outside to meet Kevin, who was already changed into a rather tight shirt and jeans, and waiting for her near the entrance.

"Sorry," Amy apologised, hurrying up to her date. "Am I late?"

"Nah," Kevin said. "I'm early. You look great."

123.content:
Renna sat at her desk, one of many that filled the office block in which she worked. She gave a heavy sigh as she glanced down at her watch and realised there was still another hour to go until her shift was over. Renna hated her job, in fact, she barely understood most of the mundane tasks she was asked to do during the day. Most of her job consisted of inputting facts and figures onto the company database, and making sure reports were sent off by the end of the day.

Renna had to admit, this wasn't exactly what she had planned to do after finishing college. Her best friend and room mate, Violet, had somehow managed to find her dream job working in a restaurant, while Renna, who had studied Psychology, was now working in the most boring office imaginable. Still, at least it paid well. The company she worked for, "Shadowtech", apparently had a number of contracts with defence and military programs, but Renna could never really be bothered to take an interest in what exactly it did.

She checked her watch again, and realised that only two minutes had passed since the last time she looked. She reached for the jumbo sized bag of potato chips on her desk and began piling them into her mouth to kill some time. Since starting work here, Renna had found her intake of junk food increasing dramatically, which would have been a problem if she ever put on weight. Luckily for Renna, she never did.

Renna had always had a huge appetite, but an amazingly high metabolism. She never worked out, and since starting this job, she did very little physical exercise - and yet she could still get away with a a diet composed mainly of junk food. Not only did Renna stay slim, she had a great body - lightly tanned skin, shapely breasts and a firm, round butt. Her ability to maintain her figure was something of a sore point with Violet; her friend had once been slim in college, but had begun to fatten up over the past year despite her constant attempts at diet and exercise.

It took Renna about five minutes to finish the chips, after which she sent off her reports and spent the last fifty minutes of her day browsing the Internet while nobody was looking. Finally, when it reached 5 O'clock, she stood up, grabbed her coat and make a quick exit.

124.content:
Yawning tiredly, Violet entered her apartment block after a long day at work. She walked past the elevator and to the long staircase that would take her to her apartment on the fourth floor. There was a time when Violet would have taken the elevator without a moment's hesitation, but recent developments in her life, and he waistline, had forced her to reconsider her way home.

Violet gave a tiny sigh as she stared up at the four flights of stairs. From where she was standing, they seemed to go on forever. None the less, she began to climb them.

Violet worked as a Chef in 'Cappello's', a fancy Italian Restaurant downtown. After finishing college three months ago, Violet had been lucky to get a job almost immediately, and she had been incredibly excited to work at Cappello's, which had a reputation for serving some of the best food in the city. She had moved into an apartment with her college friend, Renna, who worked in an office downtown, doing something boring that Violet could never quite remember. While Renna often complained about the dullness of her work, Violet found herself to be in her dream job. She was doing what she had always wanted to do, even if she did come home every day feeling exhausted.

Unfortunately, working in a kitchen had had an unwanted side effect on Violet's body. Being around food all day long had caused an increase in her appetite, and as well as sneaking little snacks during the day, Violet had also found herself eating whole meals which had been returned by customers or ordered by mistake, as well as finishing off any left over food at the end of the day. Violet's increased appetite had inevitably lead to an increased waistline, much to her annoyance.

When she had been in college, Violet, despite her cookery classes and constant baking, had managed to stay perfectly in shape, and had never really had a tendency to overindulge. But over the past few months, she had noticed herself beginning to gain weight. She had initially tried to shrug it off, but as her belly grew larger, and her clothes grew tighter, Violet could ignore the signs no longer. Since starting work at the restaurant, she had gained twenty pounds, most of which had gone straight to her stomach, giving her a rather large pot belly. The rest of her gain was not as noticeable, and she kept it hidden beneath her chef's uniform, but Violet had been horrified by how much weight she had put on in such a short space of time.

She finally reached the last step, and leant against the wall for a moment, out of breath. At the start of the month, she had joined a gym, and her personal trainer, Kevin, had advised her to make some changes to her daily routine - taking the stairs instead of the elevator was one such change. Violet let a moment go by before she headed down the corridor and made her way to her apartment.

Knowing that her room mate would be home, she turned the handle and walked straight in.

"Hey!" Renna called from across the room.

"Hey," Violet said, feeling exhausted. "Good day at work?"

"Meh," Renna shrugged. "Same old, same old. How about you?"

"Busy," Violet said, dumping her bag in the corner and removing her jacket.

Unlike Violet, Renna had managed to keep her college figure. She was a tall brunette, with curves in all the right places. Her work clothes - a white shirt and short skirt - clung tightly to her body. Violet had to admit to being a little jealous of her friends ability to stay slim. What was amazing about Renna was that, no matter how much she ate, how much junk food she consumed, and how little she exercised, she always seemed to stay in perfect shape.

"I ordered us Pizza for dinner," Renna said. "Should be here soon, I got us an extra large one each. It was a special deal kinda thing. You like pepperoni, right?"

"Pizza?!" Violet sighed. "Renna, you know I'm trying to lose weight. I need to eat healthily!"

"Oh come on," Renna smiled. "You've hardly gained any weight at all, and you go to the gym like three times a week."

"I just think I should stay healthy, that's all," Violet said. "I see enough Pizza during the day."

In truth, Violet had not confessed the full extent of her weight gain to Renna. Whenever she was at home, she was either wearing her loose chef's uniform, or her baggy sweats, both of which hid her gains nicely.

"Okay then," Renna shrugged. "All the more for me."

Violet sighed and walked to her room, she was sure that Renna would probably be able to devour every last slice of pizza without gaining so much as a single pound. Entering her room and locking the door behind her, Violet began to remove her clothes. Her white uniform was covered with food stains and dirt, and she tossed it aside happily, piece by piece, until she stood in only her underwear.

She looked down at her bulging stomach and rubbed it gently. She had tried to cut down on her worktime snacking, but had ended up eating two bowls of pasta today, as well as a dozen slices of garlic bread. She just didn't seem to be able to help herself anymore. Violet turned to the side and gazed at her reflection in the full length mirror on her wall - she couldn't believe how much her once slim body had softened up.

When she had been at college, she had actually been a size smaller than Renna, looking at herself now, she could hardly believe that. She wasn't 'fat', not by a long shot, but she was definitely on her way to 'chubby'. Her protruding belly was where most of the weight had settled, and Violet was grateful that the weight had stayed off her face. In college, she had had no shortage of male admirers due to her pretty looks. Her deep blue eyes, short blonde hair and cute smile were her favourite features of hers, and she had taken pride in her attractive appearance before she started putting on weight.

She looked down sadly at her pot belly and grabbed a roll of fat. She didn't seem to be losing weight, despite her constant trips to the gym and use of the stairs, but her gains had slowed down lately, at least.

With one last look at her half naked body, Violet pulled out her dull, grey sweats and changed into them.
124.title: Violet

When she entered the front room, Renna was at the door, taking delivery of two huge Pizza boxes. She paid the delivery guy and turned round to see Violet heading for the door.

Violet walked out, wondering if what she had said had sounded a little harsh. She was actually starting to get annoyed with Renna for staying in such dam good shape.

---

Even though she was trying to do more walking, Violet wasn't prepared to walk all the way to the Gym, so she boarded a bus and was there within fifteen minutes. Prior to last month, Violet had never even bothered to exercise, let alone purchase a full years Gym membership. She had been quiet self conscious upon first entering the Gym, but had soon settled in. She had quickly discovered that nobody really paid attention to each other while they were working out.

Violet crammed her stuff into her locker and walked into the main Gym, which seemed to be a lot busier than usual. Violet just about managed to secure herself a Treadmill before they all got taken. She set the speed and began jogging. She still wasn't quite used to her extra poundage, and the feeling of her stomach jiggling up and down as she jogged was a peculiar one.

"Violet, good to see you!"

Violet turned her head to see Vince, her personal trainer, approaching. She had to confess that part of the reason for the frequency of her visits to the Gym lately were due to a desire to impress Vince. He was handsome, and had a perfect physique, which usually attracted the attention of many of the Gym's female members.

"Hey Vince," Violet said, continuing to jog while trying to suck in her stomach. "It's busy in here tonight, I don't think I've ever seen it so full."

"Yeah," Vince said, glancing around the busy room. "We've had an influx of new members over the past two weeks, it's gotten crazy, but the bosses aren't complaining. More memberships equals more money."

"I guess so," Violet said. "I prefer it quiet though."

"Yeah, me too," Vince smiled. "So, hows your diet going?"

"Oh...it's going great," Violet lied. "I've been doing a lot more exercise lately."

"Cool," Vince said. "Just keep it up, I gotta go check on someone else, but I'll be back to check on you later, okay?"

Violet smiled and nodded as Vince walked away. She felt bad lying to him, but she couldn't stand to admit she hadn't even begun her diet yet. Violet looked to her left, and saw a girl about twice as big as her, wearing ill fitting sweats and puffing and panting on the treadmill. Violet saw an even larger woman to her right, who seemed to have the treadmill on it's slowest setting, and was still out of breath. Violet hoped she would never let herself go as badly as these two had.

---

After finishing about an hour on the treadmill, a half hour on the exercise bike and fifteen minutes on the rowing machine, Violet decided to call it a night. She was sweating heavily, and totally exhausted, and figured she had done enough work tonight, besides, there was barely enough room to move in the Gym this evening, and Vince had been too busy to pay her a second visit. She headed back to her locker, and saw a few other women gathering up their things. Two girls, who Violet guessed were about her age, were deep in conversation a few lockers down, and Violet couldn't help but eavesdrop.

"I'm getting so fat!" The one girl said, grabbing a roll of flab from her stomach and shaking it at her friend. "I don't know what's wrong with me, I'm not eating any more than usual but I keep getting bigger!"

"I know, I'm putting on weight too," the second girl said. "I don't understand it, I'm here all week, but I can't seem to get rid of these extra pounds!"

"At least all your weight seems to go to your boobs," the first girl pouted. "Look at this fat gut, I can't fit into anything anymore! I'm so embarrassed, I'm turning into a gross, fat pig!"

Violet looked the two girls over; the first girl was fairly slim, but quite chunky thighs and a huge pot belly, which was riding up underneath her sweat covered T-shirt. The second girl was curvier, and, as the first girl had said, had particularly large breasts, which didn't seem to fit into her T-shirt very well at all. Violet realised she was staring a bit too much, and looked away, before grabbing her things and heading home.

12411.content:
After hopping on the bus and making her way back to her building, Violet climbed the stairs once again. Every part of her body was aching from her workout, but she willed herself onwards until she reached her door and hurried inside her apartment.

As she closed the door behind her, Violet spotted Renna, sprawled out on the couch, surrounded by empty Pizza boxes, looking thoroughly exhausted.

"You should have stayed for Pizza," Renna said. "It was awesome..."

Violet moved closer to Renna, and noticed that her room mate's stomach was incredibly bloated. Renna had clearly stuffed herself silly with every last slice of Pizza. The overstuffed brunette had changed out of her work clothes and into a white T-shirt and jeans, which Violet noticed were unbuttoned, allowing Renna's bulging belly some more room.

"Did you eat all of it?" Violet asked, shocked at her friend's gluttony.

"Every last slice," Renna said, rubbing a hand over her distended stomach and letting out a loud belch. "Oops, sorry...I'm still a little gassy."

"A little?" Violet smirked.

Renna just grunted in response, and continued rubbing her stomach. Violet crossed the room and entered the kitchen. She still hadn't eaten dinner herself, and now that the Pizza was out of the way, she could avoid giving into temptation and fix herself something healthy. She pulled some fruit and vegetables out of the fridge and began to chop them into a salad. She was amazed by just how much Renna food seemed to be able to pack away into that slim body of hers.

Violet heard another belch, and looked up to see Renna standing in the doorway to the kitchen. Her bulging stomach was almost completely exposed now she was standing upright, and Violet's eyes were immediately drawn to it - unlike her own, flabby stomach, Renna's was perfectly round and firm. She looked a few months pregnant with it sticking out the way it was.

"I'm gonna head to bed," Renna said, stretching her arms, causing her T-shirt to ride up and expose more of her bloated belly. "I'm in a total food coma right now."

"You know, you should watch what you eat," Violet warned her. "Before you know it, you'll be joining me at the gym."

"Like that will ever happen," Renna smiled, letting out another belch before walking away.

Violet rolled her eyes. It would serve Renna right if she did put on a few pounds. She finished making her salad and ate it fairly quickly; it wasn't exactly the most satisfying meal, but Violet stopped herself from having anymore. She was actually pretty proud of what she had accomplished today, her earlier pasta pig-out aside.

---

After cleansing her rather damp body in the shower, Violet tossed aside her dirty sweats and changed into her nightie. It was a silky purple number that stopped just below her butt, and, like the rest of her wardrobe, it had been getting tighter lately. Luckily, it had been loose when she bought it, so it still fit her well. She took a moment to check out her body in the mirror, wondering how many calories she had burned off today, then climbed into bed.

Tomorrow, she would weigh herself, and see if her weight was starting to change...

124111.content:
Violet looked down at the floor this morning, there it was, just sitting on the bathroom floor. Her long time enemy, the one thing that would immediately ruin her day and then just mock her with false hopes...

... The bathroom scale.

"Its alright Violet," the chubby young woman told herself as she slowly lifted her foot up into the air. "You've been extremely good with your diet and exercise regime. Hopfully it'll show this morning."

With a audible gulp, the young woman planted her foot onto the scale, watching as the digital numbers began to flash on the darkened screen. Violet was almost tempted to pull her foot off, but knew she needed to do this. So, with her eyes closed, Violet snapped her other foot onto the scale and waited for a few seconds for the machine to register her weight...

...

Slowly, a smile crept onto Violet's face, "YESSSSSSSSSSSS! I LOST WEIGHT!!!"

Sure it was only three pounds, but it was a start at the very least.

Violet sighed out in relief as she stepped off the scale, she was finally on her way and was congratulating herself when all of a sudden...

"AAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!"

A loud scream echoed through out the apartment room, making Violet forget about her own success for the moment. "Renna?!"

Rushing out of the bathroom, Violet ran towards Renna's room, the door completely closed off. Violet reached the door and began to slam her hand into the door, "Renna!?! Is everything alright?!"

"D-Don't come in here!" Renna shouted through the door.

"Renna! What's going on?!?" Violet shouted as she ran her hand onto the doorknob, realizing that the door wasn't locked. "I'm coming in Renna!"

"NO!"

Violet opened the door and saw...

Renna stood for a moment, frozen in place, her face filled with embarrassment. Violet wasn't quite sure what to say, she was just about to apologise and excuse herself when she noticed the reason for Renna's apparent difficulty with her clothing - Renna was still looking thoroughly bloated from her binge last night, in fact, she looked a little bigger. Her bulging belly seemed to protrude much farther than it had yesterday...

"Erm...is everything okay?" Violet asked, trying not to stare at Renna's exposed stomach.

Renna turned around in an attempt to hide herself from Violet, but in doing so, exposed her the top of her butt, which seemed to be trying to escape from Renna's very tight looking pants. Was Renna putting on weight too? Violet certainly hadn't noticed until now, but maybe Renna was better at hiding her extra pounds than she was.

"I told you not to come in," Renna said in a panic.

Even with her back still turned, Violet could tell that Renna was trying to fasten the buttons of her shirt.

"You screamed," Violet said again.

"Yeah..." said Renna, still fiddling with her shirt. "Ruined my best shirt...it must have shrunk or something...and my pants too...plus I'm still really bloated from last night. I ate way too much Pizza."

Violet heard Renna take a breath, and then a long exhale. The brunette turned around to face her room mate with a self satisfied smile, and Violet saw that Renna had managed to button her shirt and pants, but not very well...

Renna usually chose her clothes in small sizes to accentuate every curve of her slim body, but today, all her outfit was doing was drawing attention to her large, bloated looking belly. The buttons on her shirt looked ready to burst at any moment and her thighs were clearly touching one another. Renna looked like she was wearing an outfit that was about three sizes too small for her. She had definitely gained weight. This wasn't simple bloating. All her indulgences must have finally caught up with her.

"What were you shouting about anyway?" Renna said, smoothing her hands across her shirt, touching her bulging stomach curiously.

"Oh...I lost three pounds!" Violet exclaimed excitedly, suddenly forgetting all about Renna's clothing crisis.

"Wow, good for you!" Renna smiled. "I knew you could do it. Listen, I gotta run, I'm late for work, but I'll see you tonight, okay?"

And with that, Renna, skipping her usually large breakfast, grabbed her keys, bag and phone, and hurried out the door. Violet watched her go, noticing how much rounder her ass looked. Perhaps she wouldn't be the only one going to the gym tonight...

Violet had the day off today, so she decided to have some time to herself. Being away from the restaurant would help her to avoid giving in to temptation, besides, she needed a rest, it had been a madhouse at work lately.

...

Later that day...

And with a nice cool crisp glass of water in her hand (she had cute soda completely out of her diet in order to lose weight), Violet was just enjoy some music from the radio…

RRRRRRRRINNNNNNGGGGGG!

Despite her feeling of annoyance at having her day off interrupted just when she was about to relax, Violet gathered up some of her more recent clothes and bundled them into a bag, quickly heading down to Renna's place of work. Luckily, Renna's office was situated just round the corner from their apartment, and it didn't take Violet long to walk there.

Violet had never actually been inside Renna's place of work before; but it looked as dull as Renna had always described it. Violet entered through the front door, clothes bag slung over her shoulder, and walked to the reception desk, where a bespectacled lady glared across the counter at her.

"May I help you?" The Lady asked, surveying Violet carefully.

"I'm here to drop off some clothes for my friend," Violet replied, gesturing to the bag over her shoulder with a polite smile.

"Ah...these are for the lady who had the clothing malfunction this morning, I imagine," the Lady said, with a hint of distaste in her voice. "You can find her in the ladies toilets over there." The woman pointed to the Ladies room.

"Thanks," said Violet, wondering just what kind of 'clothing malfunction' Renna had experienced.

Violet hurried inside the Ladies room, which appeared to be empty all apart from one locked cubical.

"Renna?" Violet called. "Are you in here?" I've got your clothes!"

"Violet?!" Renna's voice came from behind the locked door. "Thank God!"

Suddenly, the locked door was unlocked and pulled open, and Renna appeared, framed in the doorway, but Violet had never seen Renna looking quite like this before! Renna, the girl who had always been able to eat whatever she wanted and never gain a single pound, now stood before Violet, her face a mixture of confusion and embarrassment. The brunette's shirt hung wide open, and in place of Renna's usually flat stomach was the same food stuffed, bloated belly she had sported last night after her Pizza binge, only now, it looked even bigger!

Violet's eyes nearly popped out of her head as she continued to gawk and stare at Renna's exposed belly. Renna seemed to have gained this new pot belly overnight! Surely it wasn't just bloating? Renna had to have been hiding her weight gain somehow before this point...but Violet had no idea how.

"What the hell happened?!" Violet blurted out.

"I don't know!" Renna said. "I've never stayed bloated for this long before! I don't even feel full anymore!"

Renna placed a hand on her stomach, and Violet saw it sink slightly into the soft ball that was her stomach. That wasn't bloating, Violet thought, that was flab.

"It's been getting worse all day!" Renna continued. "My clothes were tight this morning, but they've just been getting worse since I got into work. My shirt ripped open in front of everyone at the water cooler! I barely covered myself up before I ran in here, and then my pants ripped open! I can't believe this! What the hell is happening to me?!"

Violet just shook her head in disbelief. Renna's belly was easily bigger than her own, she had never seen anything quite like it!

Both young women were quiet as they watched the button fall to the ground, but it didn’t stop there, the button at the height of Renna’s stomach shot off as well. This time however, Renna didn’t remain quiet, she fell to her knees and began to sob loudly, “W-W-WHAT’S HAPPENING TO ME?!?!”

"Renna, we need to get you to a Hospital, this isn't right!" Violet said, kneeling down beside her friend, who had lost another button when she fell to her knees and put even more pressure on the overly tight shirt.

"Y-You're right," Renna said, wiping the tears from her eyes. "I can't go on like this. Let's go."

Violet helped Renna up and they hurried out of the restroom, Renna folded her arms over her chest and made an attempt at sucking in her belly, but it did little to hide her current situation. "Come on, let's go," Violet said, returning to Renna's side.

The two girls hurried out of the building, with Renna trying to conceal as much of her newfound girth as possible. It was strange for Violet to see Renna like this, for once, she was the slimmer one! Renna flagged down a cab, and she and Violet climbed inside.

"Get us to the Hospital, quickly!" Renna said.

Violet would have preferred to walk. The Hospital wasn't too far away, and she was really starting to enjoy this new, healthier lifestyle, but she doubted Renna wanted to waddle across town in her current condition. Violet cast a sideways glance at her bulging roommate, and noted that Renna's bloated belly looked even bigger now that she was in a seated position. It rested on her lap, the buttons clinging on, pulling apart the shirt and exposing the growing flab beneath. Renna shifted uncomfortably and tugged awkwardly at the ridiculously tight shirt.

Violet tried not to stare, so instead turned and looked out the window. Soon enough, the taxi arrived at the Hospital, and Renna tossed a handful of dollar bills at the driver and clambered out. "Crap!" Renna cursed, as the cab drove off, giving Violet a clear view of her growing body. "I lost another button! It must have popped off when I got out of the cab!"

Violet examined Renna's shirt carefully; there was, indeed, another button missing from the bottom of the shirt, which now hung open slightly, exposing the bottom of Renna's bulging pot belly, as well as her belly button. "Hey!" Renna cried out. "I have not gotten that big!"

"Okay okay, maybe not that much..." Violet said compromisingly. "But she was nowhere near that size last night, there's something wrong with her."

The receptionist nodded. "I understand, please have a seat. This isn't the first time we've had an incident like this, at least a dozen other people have been in here this week with similar problems. We'll get your friend seen to right away."

Note: This section of the story deals with the history of the virus, and how it escaped into the outside world. Therefore, it is set before the outbreak.

In a top secret military base, deep beneath the Nevada Desert, government scientists have been working on the E-Formula. The E-Formula was envisioned as a way of increasing the physical power of soldiers in the military. When the E-Formula was administered to a soldier, it would cause them to grow stronger by increasing the size of their muscles, enhancing their height or adding some extra weight to their frame. The formula had been designed to be the ultimate body manipulation tool - improving the effectiveness of the military and strengthening it's soldiers overnight.

But unfortunately, not everything had gone to plan...

Ever since the base became home to the E-Formula project, there had been numerous setbacks, miscalculations and outright failures, which had caused many in the military to lose faith in the project. But the scientific team was working harder than ever to make the project a success, and they were nearing a breakthrough in their research...

Characters:

Professor Keith Adams: Young, dynamic and in charge of research at the base. Professor Adams is under constant pressure from his superiors, and has doubts about the ethics of the project.

Doctor Lauren Michaels: Recently invited onto the base after graduating from college, Lauren is young and eager to work on the E-Formula project. At 22, she is one the youngest people on the base. Her long blonde hair, attractive features and perfect body often draw the eyes of many of the soldiers stationed on the base, much to her embarrassment.

Nurse Kristin: Kristin is a busty blonde who takes care of the medical aspects of the project and the general health and well being of the staff on the base.

Sgt. Taylor Meadows: Sgt. Meadows resents being placed on such a boring assignment. Young, fit and athletic, she does not know the details of the scientific research being undertaken at the base.

Private Leon Stewart: Leon is a new arrival on the base, stationed there as punishment for insubordination. Young, handsome and with a very strong moral code. What Leon doesn't know is that he was sent to the base to act as a test subject...

Martin: Known only by his first name, the shadowy Martin serves as the overseer of the project. He is only 23 years old, but is the representative of the secretive financiers of the government project - a company known as 'Shadowtech'. While outwardly charming and cheerful, Martin cares only for his own agenda. He ensures that the scientific team gets results. (Note: Martin is not a choice, just a supporting character.)

131.content:
Professor Keith Adams was tired. He had been up all night working on an in depth presentation to the base's executive staff, which comprised of impatient Generals and corporate executives who had little understanding of the work being done at the base.

"And so, with an extension to our deadline...I am quite confident that we can begin humans trials in as little as two months."

There were grumbles of dissatisfaction from around the room, as those crowded around the meeting table exchanged apprehensive looks. Professor Adams knew what was coming next, a demand for more progress, faster results and total success by the end of the month. He had been dealing with such unrealistic demands ever since he started work at the base.

General Parks, the commander of the base, shook his head. "Two months is too long. Do you have any idea how much money our financiers have sunk into this project, Professor? They want results, and it's my ass on the line here."

A small chuckle came from across the other side of the room, and Professor Adams turned to face a man he had grown to hate over the last few months: Martin. The always cheerful, always mysterious representative of just whoever it was that was backing this project. Martin seemed to exist solely to make sure the project was kept on track.

"You need not worry General," Martin said, smiling in the General's direction. "My employers know you are doing your best. We merely require quicker results, especially where human testing is concerned."

"Human testing is dangerous," Professor Adams said. "We need to continue our simulations before we can be sure human testing is safe."

"We've already got you willing test subjects," General Parks snapped. "Use them."

"I agree with the General," Martin said, still smiling. "My employers would like Human trials to begin immediately. Use one of the willing subjects, if anything goes wrong, nobody will hold you responsible."

"There," General Parks grumbled. "You heard the man Professor, begin the trials. Now."

"Sir I don't think..."

"Professor, I'm giving you a direct order. Begin the trials."

Keith knew it was useless to argue. He was beginning to wish he had never been selected to head up this project. While he had been told it was the opportunity of a life time by his superiors, and that he was perfect for the job, he had concerns over the ethics of this so called 'E-Formula'. He wondered whether the world was ready for such a breakthrough in genetic manipulation.

"We have our decision then," Martin clapped his hands together. "I look forward to seeing the results Professor Adams, we will all be watching you very closely over the next few days."

Keith sighed, and made his way back to his lab. It seemed as though he would begin human trials whether he wanted to or not...

"I know, don't worry, it'll be gone by next week," Jake said, but he didn't look very confident.

Brad nodded again. Losing a paunch like that in one week didn't seem possible, but hopefully Jake would be able to trim down at least a little, or else he would be off the team. Brad had seen it happen before, a player would get too confident in his abilities, slack on his training and end up piling on weight by accident. Brad had promised himself this would never happen to him. He was going to go professional after he got a college scholarship. He removed his underwear and followed Jake into the showers, where they were soon joined by the rest of the team, who discussed the game and gave Brad a victorious cheer, naming him "man of the match" as usual.

Once he had cleaned up, Brad grabbed a towel and dried himself off, quickly changing into his regular clothes before heading home for the day.
1452.title: Brad

choices: As he drives home, Brad's body begins to change...
Brad gets home and finds a huge dinner waiting for him!
14521.content:
As Brad headed out, a sudden rumbling came from his stomach. He shrugged it off, reminding himself that he would be home soon, but the rumbling continued, growing louder and louder. Brad gave a grunt of pain as he suddenly found himself overcome with hunger, his stomach churning and groaning as he staggered to his car, clutching his six pack in discomfort.

"Oh man, I am starving!" Brad complained as he jumped into his car and closed the door.

Slamming his foot on the gas, Brad raced out of the school car park, rubbing his protesting stomach as he drove, confused as to why he was feeling so famished. He turned a corner and passed a McDonalds, and, without thinking, pulled into the drive through. While he wouldn't normally eat junk at this time of day, he needed something to quieten his growling belly. He pulled up to the till and ordered a Big Mac, large fires and milkshake, and within minutes he had crammed every last bite into his open mouth.

"URP! That feels better," Brad said, patting his full stomach.

As he went to pull away, he was amazed when his stomach gave another rumble. "What the hell? I just ate!" He moaned, but his stomach only rumbled louder in response. Deciding to ignore his persistent hunger, Brad went to pull out of the McDonald's car park...but the hunger returned with a vengeance. He let out a moan and clutched his abs before turning the car back into the drive through.

---

Half an hour later, Brad was still eating. His return trip to the drive through had been followed by another three trips, and each time, he had increased the size of his order, doubling up his fries, burgers and drinks until he had ended up with three large cokes, seven double cheeseburgers and ten portions of fries. He had lost himself in the gluttonous feast, and sat in the driver's seat of his car stuffing his face and wiping his grease covered hands on the steering wheel. Every time he finished a meal, his stomach would rumble again and his hunger would return.

"URRRRP!" Brad gave a loud belch as he chugged down the last of his coke.

Taking a moment to rest, Brad looked at the passenger seat, which was covered in empty food wrappers and crumbs. For the first time, he realized just how much food he had ordered, and looked down at his stomach to that his flat, toned six pack had disappeared, replaced by a large, bloated ball of a belly. "Oh crap!" He gasped, clasping his hands on his bloated abdomen. He had never seen his stomach looking so huge! Brad was disgusted with himself, and would have been furious if another member of the team had made such a pig of themselves.

Before he could absorb his realization any further, his stomach rumbled again, and he immediately grabbed for his remaining burgers, devouring them all in a few bites and causing his stomach to swell even larger. He finished off the last few fries by stuffing entire handfuls into his open mouth, then chugged down his last two cokes.

"URRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" The strength of that belch surprised Brad, and he let out a tired groan. "Gotta stop this..."

His T-Shirt was skin tight, but Brad didn't want to see what was underneath. Ashamed of himself, but grateful that his hunger pangs had subsided, he started the car and raced home...

Brad was starting to feel weird. He suspected he had overdone it at the through drive through and tried to ignore the strange tingling sensation that had just overcome his body, thinking he must just have been bloated from his burger feast. But as he drove on, it became impossible to ignore the feeling. It was starting to irritate him now, and he suddenly felt a lurch in his stomach.

"What the hell was that? Feels like I'm about to barf or something..." Brad grumbled to himself as he turned the street corner.

The weirdness continued as Brad began to feel his seat-belt growing unusually tight. He pulled at the leather belt in frustration, trying to ease his discomfort, but it was no good; when it snapped back into place across his chest, it was even tighter than before. Alarmed, Brad looked down at his chest and was amazed to see a very bloated looking belly staring back at him.

"What the hell? It wasn't that bloated a minute ago!" Brad exclaimed, nearly losing control of the car as he fixated on his bulging stomach.

He wasn't far from home now, but he slowed down as his car entered the suburbs. He had to keep his attention on the road, but he kept sneaking glances at his bulging belly, and every time he looked away, it seemed to grow larger. He could only imagine that it must have been something he ate, or some sort of allergic reaction perhaps? He instantly regretted stuffing himself and acting like a pig. He removed one hand from the wheel and felt his swollen middle, only to find it growing beneath his fingers! He pulled his hand away, frightened.

"What the hell is happening to me?!"

His house wasn't far now, but his seat belt was so tight that it felt like it was about to cut him in two. He unclipped the belt and let out a sigh of relief as he freed himself. This had the singular effect of allowing his belly to surge forwards, unhindered by the belt. It spilled into his lap, growing larger and rounder with each passing moment. His pants were starting to grow tight now as well, and Brad was starting to panic. For a moment, he worried he might explode!

He finally reached his house and hastily pulled into the driveway. Once again, he stared down at his stomach in amazement and clutched at it with both hands. It felt...
1452111.title: Brad starts to grow fatter...

choices: Brad is overcome with hunger and goes to eat dinner...
Brad rings his friend Mark for advice...
14521111.content:
Brad gasped as he felt his hands sink into a soft layer of flab. This was impossible! His stomach wasn't just bloated, it was fat! The star of the football team had a fat belly. He would never live this down if the guys found out. He had been riding them hard about their recent weight gains, but now he had started piling on the pounds as well! But how had it happened so quickly?!

In a panic, Brad yanked his key out of the ignition and swung his legs out of the car. Almost instantly, the top button of his jeans burst open, allowing his newly developed belly to bulge free. Brad let out a groan of disgust as he saw what had become of his toned abs. His six pack had been replaced by a fully fledged pot belly! He jumped out of the car and stood up, enduring further humiliation as his tight T-shirt rode up over his belly. He pulled it down again quickly, but it was now skin tight. He tried to rebutton his jeans as well, but it was no use, his stomach was too big and bloated to fit into them now.

Brad looked over his shoulder and was relieved to see that he had not been spotted. He grabbed his keys and ran into the house.

"Brad, is that you?" He heard his mom called from the kitchen. "Dinner's nearly ready."

"Okay Mom!" Brad shouted back. The last thing he wanted to do now was eat.

The pot bellied Jock hurried up the stairs to his room, quickly bypassing the kitchen so nobody would see him in his current state. His new belly jiggled as he climbed the stairs, it was a completely alien feeling to Brad, who had never been anything but toned and muscular. He was horrified by the changes he was undergoing. He reached his room and ducked inside, locking the door behind him and crossing the room to where his full length mirror was positioned on the wall.

Usually, he would spend hours posing in front of this mirror, wearing nothing but his boxers and flexing his muscles as he admired his body. Now, he could hardly stand to look at himself. None the less, he needed to see what had happened to him in full. He fearfully pulled his T-shirt off over his head and tossed it aside, then turned to face his reflection.

His six pack was gone and in it's place was a large, bulging pot belly. Love handles sagged over the sides of his tight, unbuttoned jeans and he grabbed them and shook them in horror. How had this happened so fast?! He was relieved that only his belly had been affected so far though; his arms maintained their well defined muscles and his face was still slender and handsome. But his gut could not be ignored...he gave his flabby belly a slap and growled in annoyance.

"God dam it," he muttered as he continued to slap his belly and watch it shake.

Brad crossed the room and sat down on the edge of his bed. His belly seemed bigger than ever as he watched it spill into his lap. He had to think of a plan...

"Uhhh, just heading to my car dude...why do you ask?" Jackson asked nervously. As Jackson turned around, Brad noticed that while his torso was still slim, there was a bit of a pooch below his belly button and he had started to form small love handles as well.

He knew damn well that neither Jake or Jackson were going to loose that much weight, but he just hoped they could get themselves into the best shape they could, and still help the team in a positive way.

145232121.content:
Over the next week, Jackson and Jake tried their best to regain their impressive, toned bodies...but their efforts were useless. The two of them started working out together, going to the gym six times a week as they had promised; spending most of their time on running machines. They would spend hours working at the machines until they were so tired they could barely breathe. Jake was sure these new intensive gym sessions would help them to regain their formerly trim physiques and shed their recent weight gains, but as the week went on, their weights stayed the same.

"I can't believe it," Jackson huffed one day as she slumped onto the bench in the gym's changing rooms. "All this exercise and I don't think I've lost a single pound!"

"I know dude, what the hell is going on?!" Jake asked, removing his shirt to reveal his flabby belly. "I haven't been eating anything different, and I just seem to keep getting bigger!"

"Me too!" Jackson said, rubbing his hands over his bulging stomach. "This stupid belly just keeps growing. I swear it's gotten even bigger this week. Why the hell isn't all this exercise doing anything?!"

The angry boys changed out of their gym clothes; Jackson having to force his tight jeans up past his thickening legs and widening thighs. Even when he managed to button them up, they felt ready to burst at any moment. Jake had gained a little more weight up top, and was having trouble fitting into his shirt, which stretched across his newfound pot belly and rode up to reveal his belly button. Looking at them, it was hard to believe either of these boys were on the football team.

"Oh man, what's Brad going to say?" Jackson sighed.

"Probably throw us off the team," Jake grumbled. "I can't say I blame him. We're not fit to be on the team anymore."

"Maybe just one more week of exercising?" Jackson suggested.

"Maybe..." Jake replied, but he doubted even that would work.

---

145232121.title: They both can't get in shape.

1452321211.content:
Jake and Jackson ambled into the changing rooms, dreading the lecture that Brad was about to give them. Over the past week, despite their constant exercise and strict dieting, they had only gotten bigger; their stomachs now the size of basketballs, and could not be hidden, no matter how much they tried to suck in. Jake had grown to be the larger of the two, and had been forced to buy new pants after splitting his old ones open one night. Jackson had managed to cram himself into jeans that were at least two sizes too small for him, and his shirt kept riding up and exposing his new pot belly.

When the guys entered the rooms, they found Brad waiting for them. They looked guiltily at each other, fully expecting to be kicked off the team at any moment...then they noticed Brad's stomach. Standing before them dressed only in his underwear, Brad looked a little sheepish himself, and it was obvious why...his once perfect six pack had vanished, and been replaced by a bulging, round belly. He tried to suck it in as they approached, but it barely made any difference. The rest of his toned, muscular physique looked just as impressive as ever, but there was no denying he had put on a few pounds.

"Brad...we..."

"Guys, it's okay," Brad said, exhaling slightly as his belly puffed out. "You're not the only ones who have put on a little weight."

"We've tried so hard this week!" Jake cried out. "Nothing works!"

"He's right," Jackson said. "We've been working out every day, more than usual. We should at least have stopped gaining weight, but we've only put on another ten pounds!"

Brad rubbed a hand over his rounded stomach and shook his head. "Me too...this isn't natural...have you guys eaten anything weird lately? Maybe we're having some allergic reaction or something!"

"This isn't an allergy dude, this is flab!" Jake said, lifting up his top to reveal his flabby gut.

"Jesus, how much do you weigh?!" Brad asked in shock.

"I don't know...I don't think I want to find out..." Jake said, pulling his shirt back down as his face went red with embarrassment.

"You're not taking any...you know..."

"Drugs? No way!" Jackson replied. "Are you?!"

"Of course not!" Brad snapped. "Sorry...I just can't think of a way to explain this. Maybe we should see a Doctor or something?"

"That might be a good idea..." Jackson groaned, patting his doughy belly.

"Okay, one of us should make an appointment," Brad said. "I'm the smallest, so I guess I'll go before I get any worse. I'll tell you what happens."

The guys agreed to the plan, and preceded to get changed for the game. Their uniforms were becoming uncomfortably snug, and Jake could barely squeeze into his top. He managed to cover himself with padding and disguise most of his recent gains, but his movements throughout the game were slow and sluggish, and every time he fell over, he could hardly bring himself to stand back up. Jackson was little better, and was constantly out of breath every few seconds. The other players were picking up on their poor performance, and they were lectured by the Coach more than once.

Brad's performance was not yet affected, though he didn't score as many touchdowns as he usually did, and on the way back to the showers he looked exhausted.

---

That night...
